about_the_game:
You are a robot courier with a unique AI, awakened from 20 years of TERRA AI hibernation. You are tasked with restoring power to the towers of the complex and bringing them back online.



Our game stands out with unique puzzles, an exciting story, and extraordinary graphics that immerse the player in the unique world of Factory Tower!
The Factory Tower complex consists of several skyscrapers that are advanced robotics factories.
Each tower is controlled by specially created AIs, and all of them are controlled by TERRA AI. The complex is fully autonomous and is able to function unmanned but with reduced efficiency.
Each tower is designed to perform certain factory jobs. One is for assembly, another for storage, and so on. This creates different objects and hazards waiting for you in each new tower.



Join this thrilling Factory Tower journey with unique puzzles and an exciting story designed to immerse you in a world of intrigue and mystery!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Immerse yourself in the unique experience of rebuilding the towers of the complex with the robot courier and his AI. Solve puzzles, explore mysterious towers and restore Terra's factories to working order. Embark on an exciting journey where every step brings new challenges and mysteries!
